name: American Revolution
description: The American Revolutionary War (1775-1783) was a conflict in which the Thirteen Colonies gained independence from Great Britain, forming the United States of America.
metaDescription: Experience the American Revolution as if social media existed. Follow the Founding Fathers, British officials, and ordinary colonists through this pivotal moment in history.

name: Ancient Rome
description: The Roman Empire at its height, including the Republic and Imperial periods.
metaDescription: Coming soon: Experience Ancient Rome through the eyes of emperors, senators, gladiators, and citizens.

name: World War II
description: The global conflict from 1939 to 1945 that reshaped the modern world.
metaDescription: Coming soon: Experience World War II from all fronts through soldiers, leaders, and civilians worldwide.
